Matthew Peixoto

Moments

Finding a few moments each day to take a few deep breaths and quiet your mind is a great way to relieve stress and improve your overall health. The Moments app and necklace work together to help you decompress and stay centred throughout your busy day by tracking your breathing, analyzing your heart rate, and guiding you through moments of complete mindfulness.

Visual Design

A look inspired by zen.

Colour

Momentâ€™s colour palette both adheres to material design and mimics nature to help soothe the mind and body.

Typography

Roboto delivers a unified experience to users and allows Moments' beautiful visuals in take center stage.

Iconography

Moments uses icons directly from material design. Material icons use geometric shapes to visually represent core ideas, capabilities, or topics. These icons are also beautifully crafted, delightful, and easily express ideas.
